message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a unique opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality item that will benefit your business.

Alice, your offer is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm very interested in the product, but I can only go up to $1250000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value you've placed on it and my own budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your concerns about the price, but I'm still confident that the product is worth more than 1250000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer a price of 1350000. I believe this is a fair compromise that benefits both of us.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still stuck at $1300000. This is the absolute highest I can go, and I'm confident it's a fair price considering the value we've both agreed upon. I'm ready to close the deal at this price, but I need you to come down just a bit.

I understand your position, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still not willing to go below 1350000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer a price of 1325000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I hope you can understand that I need to make a profit on this sale.

Alice, while I appreciate your commitment to finding a compromise, I'm still unable to go above my initial offer of $1300000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value we've both agreed upon and the fact that I have other options available. I'm confident that closing the deal at this price will benefit us both.

I understand that you're firm on your offer, Bob, and I appreciate your honesty. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for 1300000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer a price of 1315000. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, and I hope you can understand that I need to make a profit on this sale. If not, I'll have to consider other options.
